title: SchemaComposition
description: Combines multiple schemas using boolean logic. allOf requires all subschemas to validate; anyOf requires at least one; oneOf requires exactly one; not inverts the result of the subschema.

allOf.description: All listed subschemas must validate against the instance

anyOf.description: At least one of the listed subschemas must validate against the instance

oneOf.description: Exactly one of the listed subschemas must validate against the instance

not.description: The instance must not validate against this subschema
